about_the_game:
This DLC is for those of you who want to show your support for us. And you'll receive a nice exclusive hat!

We might add some more bonuses to this edition later.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
